comments.author: netzen@gmail.com
comments.text:
We can improve responsiveness and startup by keeping the files we write to frequently defragged (Bug 692252).

This task is to add telemetry to see the level of fragmentation for the files in the profile dir.
comments.creator: netzen@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
We can improve responsiveness and startup by keeping the files we write to frequently defragged (Bug 692252).

This task is to add telemetry to see the level of fragmentation for the files in the profile dir.

comments.creator: taras.mozilla@glek.net
comments.author: taras.mozilla@glek.net
comments.text: Note this needs the updater service to query fragmentation status from OS
comments.raw_text: Note this needs the updater service to query fragmentation status from OS
